name: Landscapes Puzzle – MPW
description:
Test our collection of puzzles free landscapes. This game helps exercise the ability to pattern recognition, creativity and imagination. The puzzles are divided into 3x3, 4x4 or 5x5 parts disorderly. You must place all the pieces of the puzzle in the correct position.

• 2 fun game modes
• 3 amazing levels
• Includes world ranking
• App for all ages

If you like jigsaw puzzles with pictures of attractive majestic landscapes and the challenges we have the app just for you. My Puzzle World Landscapes is one more version of My Puzzle World with a collection of great outlets such as: jungles, forests, savannas, deserts, forests, tundra, mountains, etc. Account with two game modes that you already know, by time and score.

In the game mode by time, will give you a fragmented picture, which you must touch in its different parts to make them rotate and well suit up to be in the correct position. Against less time afternoons higher score of star and you'll get moving and unlocking the puzzle below.

In the game mode by score, you'll have access to all the puzzles, but before you start you'll need to choose the difficulty; a smaller number of parts, which will be divided the puzzle, to a larger number. Once you have chosen the difficulty, you have to move the different pieces of the puzzle for exchange of place and thus achieve suit up to resolve the image. Here the time is not the factor to overcome, the lower the number of movements you'll get higher score.

Have fun and contemplates vibrant photos, with an excellent visual composition and solve the puzzles with great intelligence in My Puzzle World Landscapes.

Below you will mention some classes of landscapes that you can find in My Puzzle World Landscapes: railways, tundra, plains, forests, plains, fence, rural roads, icy mountains, farms, crops, skies, seas, land, sunsets, sunsets, sunrises, lakes, bridges, rivers, clouds, dunes, icy rivers, parks, autumn, winter, spring, summer, high mountains, scrub, savannas, deserts, arctic, polar, continental, oceanic, mediterranean.
